metadata.title: CVE-2021-39914 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A regular expression denial of service issue in GitLab versions 8.13 to14.2.5, 14.3.0 to 14.3.3 and 14.4.0 could cause excessive usage ofresources when a specially crafted username was used when provisioning anew user

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
